channel.title: jagjeevan on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Speaker | Gatherverse Book Summit 2025
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ğŸ“¢ Gatherverse Book Summit 2025: Exploring Books, Language and Meaning in the Age of New Technology. In the intersection of emerging technologies and humanity, this GatherVerse event aims to deep dive into the current and future state of books in an age defined by artificial intelligence. This is a space for authors, researchers, engineers, ethicists, educators, publishers, technologists and readers. We explore what it means to write, publish, and trust books in a time where machine-generated language is flooding the landscape

item.title: ğŸ“• Available Now! Jagjeevan : Living Larger than Life
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ğŸ“• Jagjeevan: Living Larger Than Life is a heartfelt tribute to the extraordinary life and timeless wisdom of Shri Jagguramâ€”an enlightened soul whose values shaped generations. Blending personal memories with profound life lessons, it captures the essence of a man who lived with humility, discipline, compassion, and unwavering purpose. Through ten insightful chapters, the book explores heritage, resilience, responsibility, inner strength, family unity, conflict resolution, gratitude, and the power of oneâ€™s actions.

item.title: ğŸ“• Coming Soon! Jagjeevan : Living Larger than Life
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Life teaches us lessons every single momentâ€”but only when we pause to reflect do we truly grow. Everyone faces challenges; no life is free from problems. What defines us is not the struggle, but how we rise above it. Most challenges we encounter today are the same ones our previous generations facedâ€”whether they relate to daily life, relationships, earning, spending, or navigating responsibilities. So much wisdom already exists around us, in our homes, in our traditions, in the stories of our elders.

item.title: How Small, How Big: Seeing Life Through the Lens of the Universe
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: After a few hectic months, I recently visited a camping site with my family â€” a truly refreshing experience being close to nature. The trip was hosted by Camp Gopika and accompanied by Astrostop, adding a unique touch to our stay. The serene environment gave me time to reflect on life and also work on the final touches of my upcoming book, ğŸ“• â€œJagjeevan â€“ Living Larger than Lifeâ€, which tells the story of my great-grandfather and his belief that travel is essential for learning and introspection.
